page.title: 07AGRICULTURE & HOME LIFE
page.content: Area devoted almost entirely to agri- culture mainly {DAIRY & CATTLE} FARMS. Also some feedstock and much arable. Farms vary from quite small to larger acreage, mostly run by a single family with minimum of outside help, usually part-time. Some of these have remained in the same family ownership for many years, but sadly, recent economic depression has forced transfer to new ownership, some from outside the area. Home life is fairly simple, geared to the essential needs of farming community. Many people still find time for{hobbies}in little spare time afforded after vital running of farms is dealt with. { {Reading}catered for and enjoyed by many. Most women are avid cooks, and possibly some of the menfolk also. Local craft skills are practised in the homes whenever there is time.
